branchCategory.name: ZPR Static Conductive Suction Cup, Lateral Entry
branchCategory.description: <p>The ZPR series static conductive suction cups are used in applications where the workpiece is sensitive to damage from static electricity discharge, such as electronics.  Conductive suction cups can also be used to prevent the suction cup from sticking to the workpiece due to static electricity.</p>

breadCrumb.name: ZPR Static Conductive Suction Cup, Lateral Entry
